MovieDatabase.Actors: Robert Pattinson, Zoë Kravitz, Jeffrey Wright

MovieDatabase.Title: Interstellar
MovieDatabase.Actors: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain
MovieDatabase.Plot: Earth's future has been riddled by disasters, famines, and droughts. There is only one way to ensure mankind's survival: Interstellar travel. A newly discovered wormhole in the far reaches of our solar system allows a team of astronauts to go where no man has gone before, a planet that may have the right environment to sustain human life.
